overview: Oren has vast and varied experience as VP of finance and operations, in business development management, and economic analysis. Oren served as an economist and analyst at Singer and Even Ltd. Following Singer and Even Ltd., Oren was nominated Deputy General Manager of the Jerusalem Software Incubator Ltd., a subsidiary of Zeevi Computer and Technology Ltd. a Tel Aviv Stock Exchange company. In his last position Oren served as a VP of Finance and Operations in the JVP Studio L.P., a subsidiary of Jerusalem Venture Partners. Oren holds a B.Sc in Business management specializing in finance. Email: oren@vlvj.co.il
